casebody.data:
Harold D. HOLDING and Herbert C. Holding, Appellants-Plaintiffs,
v.
Harry R. HOLDING, Karen M. Holding, Northwest Towing and Recovery, Inc., Northwest Towing and Recovery of Muncie, LLC, and Northwest Towing and Recovery of Anderson, LLC, Appellees-Defendants Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-PL-836 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED December 5, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BAKER , J.

Affirmed.

MAY, J., Concurs.

ROBB, J., Concurs.
